records.location_details: Tychero, Evros, Greece. Shots heard from the Turkish side.
records.where_clear: Tychero, Evros, Greece, near the Turkish border
records.context_note: 13.05.2020 Text Removed - Justification 2 informed about 4 (four) shots heard on 12.05.2020 at 23:30 from the Turkish side. No Turkish Land Forces were observed nor other persons. According to Greek authority it is hardly to assess where the shots were fired from. The incident was also reported Text Removed - Justification 2, 4 who were in that area (below), however the Text Removed Justification 2, 4 was not directly affected - just heard the shots sound.
records.evidence_quote: Tychero, Evros, Greece; 4 (four) shots heard on 12.05.2020 at 23:30 from the Turkish side.

records.location_details: Evros, Greece. Two shooting incidents from Turkish patrol boats.
records.where_clear: Evros region, Greece, involving Turkish patrol boats
records.uncertainty_note: Specific location within Evros is redacted.
records.context_note: On 06.05.2020, at 19:40 hours approximately, Text Removed Justification 2, 4 contacted Text Removed - Justification 2, 4 to inform him about two new shooting incidents in Text Removed Justification 3, in the same location where shooting incident took place a few days ago: 1- 14:40 hours, 2 gunshots, from a Turkish patrol boat with three persons on board. 2- 14:45 hours, 4 gunshots, from another Turkish patrol boat with six persons on board. Text Removed - Justification 2.
records.evidence_quote: Text Removed - Justification 3, Evros, Greece; two new shooting incidents... from a Turkish patrol boat
